attributes.action: THAT THE C.P.S.PRESS CHARGES ON ALL M.P.S WHO ROBBED US ON THEIR EXPENCES .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THEY HAVE BEEN FOUND TO HAVE FILED FALSE CLAIMS & ORDERED TO PAY BACK IN FULL THIS OUTSTANDING AMOUNTS OF MONEY. THEY HAVE THE FUNDS TO DO SO  IF CONTINUING TO REFUSE PAYMENT THEN A COURT HAS TO DECIDE THE LAW OF THE LAND

rejection.details: The CPS is independent of government. MPs' expenses are a matter for Parliament rather than the Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
